hero.title: Empower Your Learning Journey
hero.subtitle: Transform the future with quality education
hero.description: Join thousands of students and teachers in our comprehensive learning platform that includes interactive courses, expert tutors, and innovative tools.

features.title: Why Choose EduPlatform?
features.subtitle: Discover the features that make our platform stand out from the competition
features.accelerated_desc: Learn at your own pace with our innovative methods
features.global_desc: Join students from around the world

benefits.title: Why Learn With Us?
benefits.subtitle: Discover the benefits that make our learning platform stand out from the rest

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our global community of learners
testimonials.sarah_content: EduPlatform transformed my career. The courses are comprehensive and the instructors are amazing!
testimonials.michael_content: The quality of education here rivals top universities. I landed my dream job after completing the Full Stack course.
testimonials.emma_content: As a working professional, the flexibility to learn at my own pace was crucial. The platform is intuitive and engaging.

cta.title: Start Your Learning Journey Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students achieving their goals with our courses

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive catalog of courses designed to advance your career
courses.no_results_desc: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria

tutors.title: Meet Our Expert Tutors
tutors.subtitle: Learn from industry professionals and experienced educators

search.placeholder: Search tutors by name, expertise or specialty...

how_works.title: How It Works
how_works.step1_desc: Browse our verified tutors, read reviews, and compare profiles to find the perfect match for your learning goals.
how_works.step2_desc: Schedule a lesson at your convenience. Choose from available time slots that work with your schedule.
how_works.step3_desc: Connect with your tutor through our secure platform and begin your learning journey with expert guidance.

cta.title: Ready to Share Your Knowledge?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of expert tutors and start making an impact on students worldwide. Set your own schedule and rates while doing what you love.

blog.title: Educational Insights & Resources
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest trends, tips, and insights in education and technology

newsletter.title: Never Miss an Update
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest insights, tutorials, and industry news

about.title: About EduPlatform
about.hero_description: Empowering learners worldwide through innovative education technology, expert instruction, and a commitment to making quality education accessible to everyone.
about.mission_text: To democratize education and make quality learning accessible to everyone, everywhere. We strive to break down barriers to education and create opportunities for lifelong learning that transform lives and communities.
about.vision_text: To become the world's leading platform for innovative and inclusive education. We envision a future where learning knows no boundaries and every individual has the tools they need to succeed.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These values guide everything we do and shape the culture of our learning community.

passion.title: Passion for Education
passion.description: We believe education is the key to unlocking human potential and creating a better world for everyone.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide the best learning experience through cutting-edge technology.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Quality education should be accessible to everyone, regardless of location, background, or circumstances.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in course content, instructor quality, and student support.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive learning community where students and educators thrive together.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We are committed to continuous learning and personal development for all our stakeholders.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From a small startup to a global education platform - here's how we've grown together.

2020.title: 2020 - Platform Launch
2020.description: EduPlatform was founded with the vision of democratizing education and making quality learning accessible worldwide.

2021.title: 2021 - First Milestone
2021.description: Reached our first milestone of 1,000 active students and 50+ expert instructors across various fields.

2022.title: 2022 - International Expansion
2022.description: Expanded to serve students in over 50 countries worldwide with multilingual support and localized content.

2023.title: 2023 - Major Growth
2023.description: Growing community of 50,000+ learners and 500+ educators from around the globe with 1000+ courses.

2024.title: 2024 - Innovation & AI
2024.description: Introduced AI-powered personalized learning paths and advanced analytics to enhance the learning experience.

success_stories.title: Success Stories
success_stories.subtitle: Real transformations from our learning community
success_stories.alex_story: The courses on EduPlatform gave me the practical skills I needed to transition from marketing to tech. Within 6 months, I landed my first developer role!
success_stories.maria_story: The data science program completely transformed my career. I went from junior analyst to leading my team in just 8 months.
success_stories.david_story: As a design student, the mentorship I received helped me build a portfolio that landed me freelance clients before I even graduated.
success_stories.sarah_story: The digital marketing courses helped me grow my small business into a full-service agency. My revenue increased by 300% in the first year.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Mission?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a learner looking to grow or an educator ready to make an impact, we'd love to have you join our community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

placeholder.message: Tell us more about your inquiry...
